'''''Refusal of Thorns''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series VII]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must use {{Pyro}} to burn all the thorns created by the [[Dendro Hypostasis]] during its Ring of Thorns attack.
